greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A048673(n) mod 4.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A003961(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); \\ Using code of _Michel Marcus_
return 1 if n==1 else (1 + reduce(mul, [nextprime(i)**f[i] for i in f]))/2
def a(n): return a048673(n)%4 # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 12 2017
xref: Cf. A246261 (positions of odd terms), A246263 (of even terms).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 31 2017
